item.title: Spreadinthelove Inc Podcast - Episode 8
item.description: Check out our podcast where we talk about everything from what we have been filming, to Green Day! Enjoy Ya'll! Check out the Rock Band Music Video we created... http://pepsi.yahoo.com/rockband/video/watch/?v=5HHgt7mIM

item.title: Spreadinthelove Inc's Podcast - Episode 7
item.description: In this delicious episode from Spreadinthelove Inc. we talk about the purchasing of a camera, or lack there of, as well as Joel's side project in school which can be found here : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7dh044pHT18. Other than that we were just talking about random things, current events, etc. We love you and hope you have a great day!

item.title: Spreadinthelove Inc's Podcast - Episode 6
item.description: In this hot n' sexy episode from Spreadinthelove Inc, we talk about Christmas and the holidays, and apologize for our absence in the podcast world. Also we have chit chat about editing and filming and we spread the love. Take a listen and ENJOY!!! We are in the process of helping the people of Hati through SocialVibe. You can help to by clicking on the link below and joining. http://www.socialvibe.com/?r=536693

item.title: Spreadinthelove Inc's Podcast - Episode 5
item.description: In this episode from Spreadinthelove Inc, we talk about the new recent things we have filmed, and the upcoming filmings. Also we have a very special guest in this podcast, so check it out and ENJOY!!!

item.title: Spreadinthelove Inc's Podcast - Episode 4
item.description: This week we talk about news with Spreadinthelove Inc, and include a special guest, Jeremiah Jones. We talk about whats been happening, ideas we have, and so on. Enjoy!!

item.title: Spreadinthelove Inc's Podcast - Episode 2
item.description: In this episode we talk about the introduction of the movie, what we have been working on, and so on. We also take time to thank everyone that has helped out thus far with our newest movie, Sassafras Men II.
item.dc:creator: Spreadinthelove Inc.

item.title: Spreadinthelove Inc's First Podcast
item.description: In episode one we talk about ideas for our newest movie, Sassafras Men II, and touch base on a few things. Sorry for the quality, there was an issue. The next episode will be 100% ready to rock!
